alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Hutchinson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hutchinson and southwestern Hansford Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morse, or 19 miles southwest of Spearman, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
